## Input.isButtonPressed() method

Allows to know if a button is pressed

Returns true if the button is pressed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isButtonPressed(buttonId: ActionButton): {
        BUTTON_DOWN: boolean;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  buttonId | <code>ActionButton</code> | The id of the button. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`{
        BUTTON_DOWN: boolean;
    }`
